description: A generic schema for representing a shipment quote both eligible and ineligible

integrationServiceId.description: A consistent identifier within the integration that represents a unique carrier service

serviceName.description: A human understandable reference that represents a carrier service

carrierName.description: A human understandable reference that represents a carrier

estimatedDeliveryWindow.description: A reference that represents the estimated travel time of the quote

begin.description: An date-time represeting the beggining of the delivery window

end.description: A date-time representing the end of the delivery window
